author: jherby2k
body:
Steps to reproduce
------------------

Set your execution policy to Unrestricted in PowerShell 6.0.x
Check out https://github.com/jherby2k/AudioWorks.git as an example
Change ModuleFixture.cs in the AudioWorks.Commands.Tests project on line 21 so that it loads $"{_moduleProject}.psd1" instead of $"{_moduleProject}.dll"

Expected behavior
-----------------

Successfully loaded module.

Actual behavior
---------------

AudioWorks.Commands.format.ps1xml cannot be loaded because running scripts is disabled on this system. For more information, see about_Execution_Policies at https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=135170

Note that the PSD1 file works as expected when loaded via Import-Module. this error only occurs using Microsoft.PowerShell.SDK 6.x

Environment data
----------------

Name                           Value
----                           -----
PSVersion                      6.0.2
PSEdition                      Core
GitCommitId                    v6.0.2
OS                             Microsoft Windows 10.0.16299
Platform                       Win32NT
PSCompatibleVersions           {1.0, 2.0, 3.0, 4.0...}
PSRemotingProtocolVersion      2.3
SerializationVersion           1.1.0.1
WSManStackVersion              3.0
title: InitialSessionState.ImportPSModule fails with .psd1 and format.ps1xml
